thread.title: Cathriona White's family speak out about death, while Zelda Williams gives shout out to Pieta House
thread.title_full: Gossip | Cathriona White's family speak out about death, while Zelda Williams gives shout out to Pieta House - entertainment.ie

author: Sheena McGinley
title: Cathriona White's family speak out about death, while Zelda Williams gives shout out to Pieta House
text:
Robin Williams' daughter, who suffered the loss of her father through suicide last year , took to twitter to speak of her heartbreak upon learning that Cathriona White died on Monday. While she was at it, Zelda raised awareness of the good work Pieta House does regarding suicide prevention in this country. Please remember, even though you feel alone - you are not alone.
Heartbroken to continue to watch sweet, kind souls be consumed by darkness. May it never hurt less, so we never grow numb to the loss.
— Zelda Williams (@zeldawilliams) September 30, 2015 In honor of @littleirishcat , please check out http://t.co/C69cSHuWsc . They do great work in her wonderful home country. RIP Cat.
— Zelda Williams (@zeldawilliams) September 30, 2015 White's family, meanwhile, have spoken out about the death of their loved one. In a statement via the Irish Independent, a rep said: "The family of Cathriona White sincerely regret the untimely passing of their beloved daughter and sister. Cathriona was a shining light in our lives who was loved deeply by her entire family. We will miss her terribly and at this difficult time we ask to be left in private to mourn our loss."
Jim Carrey releases statement regarding the death of ex girlfriend Cathriona White
